  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203345</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Inside a squid flashlight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerhalb einer Kalmartaschenlampe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À l'intérieur d'une lampe-torche de calmar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dentro de uma lanterna elétrica do calamar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">All'interno di una pila del calamaro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσα σε έναν φακό καλαμαριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dentro de una linterna del calamar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The EurekAlert news article for kids features a brief summary of the Hawaiian bobtail squid. This animal has a built-in flashlight on its underside, which is beamed downward by stacks of silvery reflector plates made from an unusual family of proteins.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der EurekAlert Nachrichten Artikel für Zicklein 
kennzeichnet eine kurze Zusammenfassung des hawaiischen bobtail 
Kalmars. Dieses Tier hat eine eingebaute Taschenlampe auf seiner
Unterseite, die abwärts durch Stapel der silbrigen Reflektorplatten 
gestrahlt wird, die von einer ungewöhnlichen Familie der Proteine 
gebildet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'article de nouvelles d'EurekAlert pour des 
gosses comporte un bref sommaire du calmar hawaïen de bobtail. 
Cet animal a une lampe-torche intégrée sur son côté en 
dessous, qui est rayonné en bas par des piles de plats argentés de 
réflecteur faits à partir d'une famille peu commune des protéines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O artigo da notícia de EurekAlert para miúdos 
caracteriza um sumário breve do calamar havaiano do bobtail. 
Este animal tem uma lanterna elétrica interna em seu lado de 
baixo, que é irradiado para baixo por pilhas das placas silvery do 
refletor feitas de uma família incomun das proteínas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'articolo di notizie di EurekAlert per i capretti
caratterizza un breve sommario del calamaro hawaiano del bobtail. 
Questo animale ha una pila incorporata sul relativo lato, che è
irradiato verso il basso dalle pile di piastre argentee del riflettore
fatte da una famiglia insolita delle proteine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το άρθρο ειδήσεων EurekAlert για τα κατσίκια 
χαρακτηρίζει μια συνοπτική περίληψη του της Χαβάης καλαμαριού 
bobtail. Αυτό το ζώο έχει έναν ενσωματωμένο φακό 
underside του, το οποίο ακτινοβολείται προς τα κάτω από τις 
στοίβες των αργυροειδών πιάτων ανακλαστήρων που γίνονται από μια
ασυνήθιστη οικογένεια των πρωτεϊνών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El artículo de las noticias de EurekAlert para 
los cabritos ofrece un resumen abreviado del calamar hawaiano del 
bobtail. Este animal tiene una linterna incorporada en su 
superficie inferior, que es emitido hacia abajo por las pilas de 
placas plateadas del reflector hechas de una familia inusual de 
proteínas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203345</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107689</entry>

  </manifestation>
